properties.name: supmap.properties.allowed-origins
properties.description: List of origins allowed to make cross-origin requests to the API. Multiple origins should be comma-separated.

properties.name: supmap.properties.database-name
properties.description: Name of the MongoDB database used by the application for storing data.

properties.name: supmap.properties.elasticsearch-password
properties.description: Password credential for authenticating with the Elasticsearch service.

properties.name: supmap.properties.elasticsearch-url
properties.description: URL endpoint for connecting to the Elasticsearch service for search functionality.

properties.name: supmap.properties.elasticsearch-username
properties.description: Username credential for authenticating with the Elasticsearch service.

properties.name: supmap.properties.jwt-secret
properties.description: Secret key used for signing and verifying JWT tokens for user authentication.

properties.name: supmap.properties.kafka-bootstrap-servers
properties.description: List of host:port pairs for establishing the initial connection to the Kafka cluster.

properties.name: supmap.properties.mongo-uri
properties.description: Connection string URI for connecting to the MongoDB database server.

properties.name: supmap.properties.frontend-base-url
properties.description: Base URL of the frontend application, used for generating links in emails and callbacks.
